name: GenericValidatorTest
description: Unit tests for the GenericValidator class, focusing on maxLength and minLength methods.

test_cases.name: testMaxLength
test_cases.description: Tests the maxLength functionality of the GenericValidator, checking various combinations of max length and line end length.

test_cases.name: testMinLength
test_cases.description: Tests the minLength functionality of the GenericValidator, checking various combinations of min length and line end length.
